text: (allaah) ne tumapar murdaar[1] tatha (bahata) rakt aur suar ka maans tatha jisapar allaah ke siva kisee aur ka naam pukaara gaya ho, unhen haî€¼raam (nishedh) kar diya hai. phir bhee jo vivash ho jaaye, jabaki vah niyam na tod raha ho aur aavashyakta kee seema ka ullanghan na kar raha ho, to usapar koee dosh nahin. allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
